# Normal Scan {#sec-normal-scan}

## Liver

### View

- **Subcostal:** Transverse & longitudinal view of RL & LL (LL must includes **caudate lobe**)

- **Intercostal:** RL

::: {.callout-warning}
#### Beware

Blind spot of liver at “superior portion of Rt lobe” 
:::

![Liver scan plane [@abd-us-step-by-step]](../../img/us/liver-scan-plane.png){#fig-liver-scan-plane width="50%"}

### Measure

- **Normal liver span:** `15 - 17 cm` (sagital, at MCL)

- **Enlarge:** `> 15.5 cm` 

- **Hepatomegaly:** confident if liver extend to caudal of Rt kidney 

(Ref: [@sono-diffuse-liver-dz])

## Billiary

### Gallbladder

- **View:** transverse & longitudinal

- **Measure:** 

    - Diameter: long < 11 cm, TV < 4 cm
    - Wall thickness < 3 mm
